title: Memorial Day sales 2022: when is it and the deals we can expect
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Your guide to the 2022 Memorial Day sales event
article: While this year's Memorial Day sales event is over, there's no better time to start preparing for next year's deals event. While it might seem like eons away, the summer sale event will be here before you know it, so we've created this guide with everything you need to know, plus all the deals you can expect. The 2022 Memorial Day sales event will take place on Monday, May 30, and the holiday weekend is the perfect opportunity to score deals on summer items like grills, patio furniture, planters, lawnmowers, and more. Memorial Day sales also include fantastic discounts on major appliances, robot vacuums, and mattresses, and you'll find tech deals on last year's models, like TVs, laptops, tablets, and more. To give you a better idea of what's on sale at next year's event, we've included the top deals from this year's sale, which include 4K TVs, AirPods, mattresses, air fryers, vacuums, and more. You'll also find out when offers officially begin and the best offers you can expect from retailers like Best Buy, Home Depot, Lowe's, and more. If you're looking for a bargain right now, you can see our guide to the 2021 Labor Day sales event.

Memorial Day is an American federal holiday that always falls on the last Monday in May to honor the men and women who died while serving in the U.S. military. The 2022 Memorial Day holiday falls on Monday, May 30, with the long weekend kicking off on Friday, May 27.

We'll start to see some Memorial Day sales pop up at the beginning of the month of May, but most official offers will begin the week before the official day, kicking off on Monday, May 23. All sales will last through the holiday weekend, and most will end on Memorial Day. We'll be updating this guide with all of the early offers, so make sure to bookmark this page for all the latest updates.

Because Memorial Day is the unofficial start to summer, you can find discounts on outdoor items such as grills, patio furniture, planters, lawnmowers, and gardening tools. Other popular categories include major appliances, furniture, kitchen devices, and vacuums from retailers like Home Depot, Best Buy, and Lowe's.

Memorial Day is also a fantastic time to find deals on mattresses, with popular brands like Casper, Nectar, and Temper-Pedic participating in sitewide sales with some of the best offers you'll find all year. If you're not interested in home items, Memorial Day sales also offer tech bargains with impressive discounts on laptops from Dell and HP and cheap TV deals from Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon.

If you need an idea of what will be on sale at next year's event, we've included the best deals from this year's Memorial Day sales. You'll find deals on mattresses, AirPods, major appliances, patio furniture, grills, TVs, and more.

You can see more mattress bargains with our roundup of the best Memorial Day mattress sales from brands like Purple, DreamCloud, and more. You can see more of the best cheap 4K TV deals and sale prices and the best cheap laptop deals.
